title: Hostel options for first year BTech students
content:
Hi,

One of my friend has taken admission in PES RR campus. He plans to stay in hostel. Is it easy to get a hostel in campus or should he plan for staying in PG?

TIA

comments.body:
I guess he could stay in the hostel for a sem or two & then maybe shift over to a PG or apartment with friends.

A few of my friends who stayed in the girls hostel on joining the university immediately switched over to PG after 1st year since they felt it was too expensive & issues in food quality. Ig boys hostel is lil better due to its location. But many had issues with the WiFi.

The boys hostel has its fair share of problems but it's a great starting point to get to know your fellow peeps and make friends . Hostel has all amenities like laundry , mess , gym , library etc which you wouldn't find all together in other pgs . I would suggest atleast for the first one or two years stay in hostel and then look for other options if you aren't satisfied.
